Description: Log message optimized for viewing in a log viewer.
Confidence level or score for the IoC, typically representing the reliability of the indicator.
Name of the threat intelligence feed that provided this IoC.
The date and time when the IoC was first observed or reported.
Unique identifier for the IoC document.
The date and time when the IoC was most recently observed or reported.
Name or label assigned to the IoC, typically describing the threat or indicator.
Provider or organization that published the threat intelligence data.
Reference URL or identifier for additional information about the IoC.
Alias or alternative names for the software associated with the IoC.
Name of the software or malware associated with the IoC.
Type or classification of the software, such as malware, trojan, or ransomware.
Tags or labels associated with the IoC for categorization and filtering.
Type or category of the IoC, such as IP address, domain, file hash, or URL.
